featured.text: Zoe was rather healthy when she was found, and once under the care of the orphanage she was very happy, consuming six gallons of vitamin-rich milk a day and earning a reputation as a confident, naughty and mischievous youngster.
The Maasai are a semi-nomadic group in Kenya and northern Tanzania, wandering in bands and living almost entirely on the meat, blood, and milk of their herds.
Milk naturally contains salt and lactose, a sugar which the human body needs in small amounts to help stimulate water 25 .
For this reason, milk can actually be more 24 than drinking water.

definition.zh_def: 牛奶，通常由母牛或其他動物產生的液體，富含營養，常用於飲用或烹飪。
definition.en_def: A white liquid produced by the mammary glands of mammals, rich in nutrients, commonly consumed as a beverage or used in cooking.
definition.example: She poured a glass of milk to go with her cookies.
